description: A JSON model file describing a Roblox instance and its descendants.

$schema.description: A URL to the JSON schema for this file.

name.description: The name of this instance. Deprecated since Rojo 6 -- the file name is used instead. If present, this field is ignored.

id.description: A unique ID for this instance, used to link referent properties across the project.

children.description: Child instances nested under this instance.

properties.description: Properties to assign to this instance. Keys are property names, values are property values (type is inferred from the class).

attributes.description: Attributes to assign to this instance. Keys are attribute names, values must be unambiguous.

modelChild.description: A child instance in a JSON model.

name.description: The name of this child instance.

className.description: The ClassName of this child instance.

id.description: A unique ID for this child instance.

children.description: Child instances nested under this instance.

properties.description: Properties to assign to this child instance.

attributes.description: Attributes to assign to this child instance.
